babel-desc: Paale a #babel Pɛsa tontnonne na bare otomatikal babel tontona daga kɔlɔm daa-yiibu ne a kpeɛõ na poɔ yeltuuri tampiletiri
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Tontoneba naŋ be gbuli ŋa poɔ wuli ka ba taa la dayeni $1 bambo ko kɔkɔre $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Tontoneba naŋ be gbuli ŋa poɔ wuli la ba kɔkɔre $1 bambo.
babel-0: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|aayi]] yɛŋ ne [[$2|$3]] (bee teɛrɛ o seɛ ne toɔrɔ nimizeere).
babel-1: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|piiluu]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-2: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|zɛge zu fẽẽ]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-3: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|zanne do zu]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-4: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|dɔgebo deme peɛloo]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-5: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|karekyeeloŋ]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-N: A tontona ŋa taa la a [[$1|dɔgebo deme]] bambo ne [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: A tontona ŋa ba [[$1|taa]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrfo]] (bee teɛ o seɛ ne toɔrɔ nimizeere).
babel-1-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|piiluu]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrefɔ]].
babel-2-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|zanne do zu]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrefɔ]].
babel-3-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|zanne gaa tɔɔre]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrefɔ]].
babel-4-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|dɔgebo deme peɛloo]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrefɔ]].
babel-5-n: A tontona ŋa taa la [[$1|karekyeeloŋ]] yɛŋ bambo ne [[$2|Bɔrefɔ]].
babel-N-n: A tontona ŋa taa la a [[$1|kɔkɔre dɔgebo]] bambo ko [[$2|Bɔrfo]].
